name: Truck vs Fire: Brain Challenge
description:
Can you delivery the bomb to the fire?
Only 3% players can pass at one time!
It's time to show off your IQ in this game!

Truck vs Fire is a completely Free physics puzzle game, let's take on the super brainstorming challenge! You will be addicted to the fun quest!

How to Play?
- Draw what ever you think and find the best way to complete each level.
- Don't be afraid to think out of the box!
- Draw lines to let the bomb pack and fire connected.

Truck vs Fire Features:
- Draw lines to let the bomb pack and fire connected.
- Completely free to play everywhere if you got the ideas.
- Very simple to play but you need think more to be a master!
- Now try to collect more stars when you pass and share it with your friends!
- Tons of puzzle levels waiting for you to pass.

So are you ready to challenge it? Get it now!
